thread.title: In the executive lounge with breakfast
thread.title_full: In the executive lounge with breakfast - Review of Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

title: In the executive lounge with breakfast
text:
While children are not school, the family to Beijing tourism, at the Beijing r&f Renaissance hotel, very wonderful experience, the hotel environment is very good, from concierge reception to stay in the room, we got the considerate service, truly the customer is supreme. Particularly in the executive lounge meal, the attendant is always smiling, check-out pearl very patience careful, also we called a taxi to the airport, it's really a very thoughtful, very happy
Room Tip: Can be convenient to book in advance See more room tips
